SEARCH

Class AddressBook

java.lang.Object
AddressBook
public class AddressBook extends Object
Singleton class representing an Address Book. Provides methods to manage address entries including adding, deleting, finding, and displaying contacts.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addAddressEntry(AddressEntry addressEntry)
    Adds a new address entry to the contacts list.
    void
    deleteAddressEntry(String lastName)
    Deletes address entries that match the given last name from the contacts list.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static AddressBook getInstance()
      Returns the single instance of AddressBook, creating it if necessary.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of AddressBook.

    • resetInstance

      public static void resetInstance()
      Resets the singleton instance. Useful for testing purposes.

    • showContactsList

      public void showContactsList()
      Displays the list of contacts sorted by last name. Prints "La lista esta vacia:(" if the list is empty.

    • findAddressEntry

      public ArrayList<AddressEntry> findAddressEntry(String lastName, boolean strict) throws Exception
      Finds and returns address entries that match the given last name. If strict is true, throws an exception if no matching last name is found.
      Parameters:
      lastName - the last name to search for.
      strict - if true, enforces strict matching of the last name.
      Returns:
      a list of matching address entries.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the list is empty or if strict matching is enabled and no matches are found.

    • lastNameExistInContactsList

      public void lastNameExistInContactsList(String lastName) throws Exception
      Checks if the given last name exists in the contacts list.
      Parameters:
      lastName - the last name to check for.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the last name is not found in the contacts list.

    • addAddressEntry

      public void addAddressEntry(AddressEntry addressEntry)
      Adds a new address entry to the contacts list.
      Parameters:
      addressEntry - the address entry to add.

    • deleteAddressEntry

      public void deleteAddressEntry(String lastName)
      Deletes address entries that match the given last name from the contacts list.
      Parameters:
      lastName - the last name of the entries to delete.

    • readFromATextFile

      public void readFromATextFile(String filename)
      Reads address entries from a text file and adds them to the contacts list.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the file to read from.

    • showContactsFound

      public void showContactsFound(ArrayList<AddressEntry> contacts)
      Displays the list of contacts found in the search.
      Parameters:
      contacts - the list of contacts to display.
